parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name> Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets data into menu entry on given path. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuSetData]] [idc, path, data] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> data: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuSetData]] [path, data] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> data: [[String]]</value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter 3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuSetData]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[0, 1], "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[true]], [[player]], 'Hello World!', 1337]"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuData]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
